name: STATIC (itch) (Crawlspace)
description:
A surreal walking simulator with audio puzzles inspired by modular synthesizers and Haruki Murakami. 

phones booths ringing in the distance voicemails left for you oblique machines red flowers rope bridges dark forests wander the static and listen closely ~  ~ ~ ~ ~ features ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
  • STATIC is about an hour long first person game, designed to be played in one sitting.
  • Solve a series of audio puzzles using mysterious machines inspired by modular synthesizers. 
  • STATIC will be available for Windows, Mac, and Linux
  • The game involves puzzles which REQUIRE AUDIO to be solved. 
  • Content Warning: Themes of loneliness and isolation. 
*AMaze Nominated 2019*  ~ ~ ~ ~ credits ~ ~ ~ ~
